mapper.select:
SELECT TTBD.CODE, TTBD.VALID, TTBD.REMARK, TTBD.NAME, TTBD.TYPE_ AS type, TTBD.CREATEDATE, TTBD.LASTUPDATEDATE FROM TESTBASICDATA2 TTBD WHERE
AND TTBD.CODE = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TESTBASICDATA2 ( CODE, VALID, REMARK, NAME, TYPE_, CREATEDATE, LASTUPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{valid}, #{remark}, #{name}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TESTBASICDATA2 WHERE
AND CODE = #{code}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TESTBASICDATA2 TTBD
VALID = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
REMARK = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
TYPE_ = #{type,javaType=com.tx.component.basicdata.testmodel.BasicTypeEnum},
CREATEDATE = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE TTBD.CODE = #{code}
